if you all know it?" thought Pierre. "What of it? It's the truth!" and he him- self smiled his gentle childlike smile, and He*l- ene smiled too. 
"When did you get the letter? Was it from Olmiitz?" repeated Prince Vasfli, who pretend- ed to want to know this in order to settle a dispute. 
"How can one talk or think of such trifles?" thought Pierre. 
"Yes, from Olmiitz," he answered, with a sigh. 
After supper Pierre with his partner fol- lowed the others into the drawing room. The guests beg
